name: Ada & Hopper
description:
Controls: InputActionW, A, S, DMove AdaLeft and Right arrow keysMove HopperUp arrow keyJump with HopperSpacebarShrink/expand HopperRRestart level

(Remember to click the game window :'D)

A game jam entry to the Bitter Jam. Sprites provided by the jam hosts. Made in 2 days (and a few extra hours).

Music: Cheap 4track by Emma_MA

Win SFX: 8bit SFX by celestialghost8

Palidanny: Level design, webpage design and game design. (First game :'D)

SRPent: Programming, level design, game design and sound.
